Rulings.Tengu:
●You can select a face-down monster.
●When a face-down Dark-Eyes Illusionist is attacked and destroyed, its effect does not activate.
●If Royal Command is actived after Dark-Eyes Illusionist's effect resolves, Dark-Eyes Illusionist's effect is negated.

Rulings.Base: 1. You can select a face-down monster.\n2. When a face-down "Dark-Eyes Illusionist" is attacked and destroyed, its effect does not activate.\n3. If "Royal Command" is actived after the effect of "Dark-Eyes Illusionist" resolves, the effect of "Dark-Eyes Illusionist" is negated.
